charges.charge_description: By force and violence, or by intimidation take from the persons of Ramona Clark, Lee Ann Cain and Janet McConnaughey, tellers, First Citizens Bank, 3626 North Main Street, Hope Mills, North Carolina, a sum in excess of $100 in United States currency belonging to and in the care, custody and control and possession of First Citizens Bank, the deposits of which are insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, and in committing the offense put in jeopardy the lives of the tellers and a customer by the use of a dangerous weapon in violation of Title 18, USC, 2113(a)(d) and 924(c)
